cast.name: 弗雷迪·默丘里 Freddie Mercury

this_title: Queen on Fire：Live at the Bowl
introduction: Recorded at the Milton Keynes Bowl, England, on 5 June 1982.Released 25 October 2004 as a double CD set and a double DVD set, and was later released on 6 June 2005 as a triple LP set.1. Flash 00:002. The Hero 01:533. We Will Rock You (fast) 03:384. Action This Day 07:015. Play The Game 12:016. Staying Power 16:577. Somebody To Love 21:028. Now I'm Here 28:559. Dragon Attack 36:1910. Now I'm Here (reprise) 39:3511. Las Palabras de Amor (intro) 41:0212. Love Of My Life 42:0213. Save Me 46:2414. Back Chat 50:4015. Get Down, Make Love 55:2416. Guitar Solo 59:0017. Drum Solo 1:05:1018. Under Pressure 1:05:4018. Fat Bottomed Girls 1:09:4220. Crazy Little Thing Called Love 1:15:3621. Bohemian Rhapsody 1:19:5022. Tie Your Mother Down 1:25:2823. Another One Bites The Dust 1:29:1524. Sheer Heart Attack 1:33:0425. We Will Rock You 1:36:3026. We Are The Champions 1:38:4027. God Save The Queen 1:42:10
